text: Ojo nadidaand, (on munkirsudagon ʙa jagonagii Alloh va ʙa risolati Muhammad sallallohu alajhi va sallam,) ki pes az onho ci qadar mardumero halok kardaem? Mardume, ki dar zamin qudratason doda ʙudem az umri daroz va pulu moli ʙisjor, on cunon qudrate, ki ʙa sumo nadodaem. Va ʙarojason az osmon ʙoronhoi paj dar paj firistodem va rudhoro az zeri pojason ravon soxtem. On goh ʙa saʙaʙi nosukrii ne'mati Alloh va duruƣ sumoridanason pajomʙaronro halokason kardem va ʙa'd az onho mardumi digare pajdo kardem
